title: [Glatoph, Glacier]
description: The snow surrounding you seems to gleam with a ghostly blue-white radiance of its own.  The snow and ice buffet you, nearly blinding you and numbing your extremities.  You wish you had worn warmer clothing, although you wonder if anything you own could possibly be warm enough.

It seems all the world has turned white.  The snow and ice buffet you, nearly blinding you and numbing your extremities.  You wish you had worn warmer clothing, although you wonder if anything you own could possibly be warm enough.
